auto-local-backup-rate.name: Auto Backup Rate
auto-local-backup-rate.description: How often a <cp>local backup</c> should be made. Only checked when the game is open

auto-backup-cleanup-limit.name: Auto Backup Limit
auto-backup-cleanup-limit.description: When creating automatic backups, if there are more than this amount of backups, the oldest automated backup will be deleted. <cy>Does not affect manually created backups, and automatic backups can be marked as non-deletable.<c/>

ask-for-online-backup-on-exit.name: Ask to Save to Cloud
ask-for-online-backup-on-exit.description: If enabled, also uses GD's built-in backup system to ask to <cy>Save to Cloud</c> on game exit.
